com.digev.fw.message

Class MessageSourceFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.digev.fw.message.MessageSourceFactory

  • public class MessageSourceFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides the default MessageSource implementation.

      • getDefault

        public static MessageSource getDefault()
                                throws com.digev.fw.exception.FrameworkException
        Returns the default MessageSource. If not previously set explicitely a ResourceBundleMessageSource is returned with the soamessages base name.
        Returns:
        Default MessageSource.
        Throws:
        com.digev.fw.exception.FrameworkException - Thrown if unable to retrieve a MessageSource.

      • setDefault

        public static void setDefault(MessageSource source)
        Changes the default MessageSource.
        Parameters:
        source - MessageSource to be used as the default.
